verses.verse: וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יָכֹ֨ל <WH3201> could יוֹסֵ֜ף <WH3130> Then Joseph לְהִתְאַפֵּ֗ק <WH662> not refrain לְכֹ֤ל <WH3605> all הַנִּצָּבִים֙ <WH5324> himself before all them that stood עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and he וַיִּקְרָ֕א <WH7121> by him and he cried הוֹצִ֥יאוּ <WH3318> to go out כָל־ <WH3605> have everyone אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every man מֵעָלָ֑י <WH5921> out וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no עָ֤מַד <WH5975> from me And there stood אִישׁ֙ <WH376> no man אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> for בְּהִתְוַדַּ֥ע <WH3045> made himself known יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> with him while Joseph אֶל־ <WH413> to his אֶחָֽיו׃ <WH251> unto his brethren

וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> aloud אֶת־ <WH853> קֹל֖וֹ <WH6963> loudly בִּבְכִ֑י <WH1065> overflowing וַיִּשְׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> heard מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4713> Egyptian וַיִּשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> heard בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> and the house פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> of Pharaoh

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יוֹסֵ֤ף <WH3130> And Joseph אֶל־ <WH413> to his אֶחָיו֙ <WH251> unto his brethren אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> I [am] Joseph הַע֥וֹד <WH5750> still אָבִ֖י <WH1> doth my father חָ֑י <WH2416> age וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יָכְל֤וּ <WH3201> could אֶחָיו֙ <WH251> to his brothers לַעֲנ֣וֹת <WH6030> not answer אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נִבְהֲל֖וּ <WH926> him for they were troubled מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> at his presence

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יוֹסֵ֧ף <WH3130> And Joseph אֶל־ <WH413> to his אֶחָ֛יו <WH251> unto his brethren גְּשׁוּ־ <WH5066> Come near נָ֥א <WH4994> Please אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about וַיִּגָּ֑שׁוּ <WH5066> to me I pray you And they came near וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I יוֹסֵ֣ף <WH3130> I [am] Joseph אֲחִיכֶ֔ם <WH251> your brother אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom מְכַרְתֶּ֥ם <WH4376> whom ye sold אֹתִ֖י <WH853> מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ <WH4714> into Egypt

וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <WH6258> Now אַל־ <WH408> not תֵּעָ֣צְב֗וּ <WH6087> Now therefore be not grieved וְאַל־ <WH408> not יִ֙חַר֙ <WH2734> nor angry בְּעֵ֣ינֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5869> with yourselves כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because מְכַרְתֶּ֥ם <WH4376> that ye sold אֹתִ֖י <WH853> הֵ֑נָּה <WH2008> here כִּ֣י <WH3588> because לְמִֽחְיָ֔ה <WH4241> to preserve life שְׁלָחַ֥נִי <WH7971> did send אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> me hither for God לִפְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH6440> me before you

כִּי־ <WH3588> for זֶ֛ה <WH2088> these שְׁנָתַ֥יִם <WH8141> For these two years הָרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> [hath] the famine בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> [been] in הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land וְעוֹד֙ <WH5750> are still חָמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> and yet [there are] five שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> years אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אֵין־ <WH369> in the which [there shall] neither חָרִ֖ישׁ <WH2758> [be] earing וְקָצִּֽיר׃ <WH7105> nor harvest

וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֤נִי <WH7971> sent אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> And God לִפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> me before you לָשׂ֥וּם <WH7760> to preserve לָכֶ֛ם שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <WH7611> you a posterity בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the earth וּלְהַחֲי֣וֹת <WH2421> and to save your lives לָכֶ֔ם לִפְלֵיטָ֖ה <WH6413> deliverance גְּדֹלָֽה׃ <WH1419> by a great

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אַתֶּ֞ם <WH859> who שְׁלַחְתֶּ֤ם <WH7971> So now [it was] not you [that] sent אֹתִי֙ <WH853> הֵ֔נָּה <WH2008> here כִּ֖י <WH3588> but הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> me hither but God וַיְשִׂימֵ֨נִֽי <WH7760> and he hath made לְאָ֜ב <WH1> me a father לְפַרְעֹ֗ה <WH6547> to Pharaoh וּלְאָדוֹן֙ <WH113> and lord לְכָל־ <WH3605> of all בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> of all his house וּמֹשֵׁ֖ל <WH4910> and a ruler בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> throughout all the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

מַהֲרוּ֮ <WH4116> Haste וַעֲל֣וּ <WH5927> ye and go up אֶל־ <WH413> to אָבִי֒ <WH1> to my father וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֣ם <WH559> and say אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> unto him Thus saith בִּנְךָ֣ <WH1121> thy son יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> Joseph שָׂמַ֧נִי <WH7760> hath made אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> God לְאָד֖וֹן <WH113> me lord לְכָל־ <WH3605> of all מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of all Egypt רְדָ֥ה <WH3381> come down אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about אַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּעֲמֹֽד׃ <WH5975> unto me tarry

וְיָשַׁבְתָּ֣ <WH3427> And thou shalt dwell בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> in the land גֹּ֗שֶׁן <WH1657> of Goshen וְהָיִ֤יתָ <WH1961> become קָרוֹב֙ <WH7138> and thou shalt be near אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about אַתָּ֕ה <WH859> you וּבָנֶ֖יךָ <WH1121> unto me thou and thy children וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> and thy children's בָנֶ֑יךָ <WH1121> children וְצֹאנְךָ֥ <WH6629> and thy flocks וּבְקָרְךָ֖ <WH1241> and thy herds וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לָֽךְ׃

וְכִלְכַּלְתִּ֤י <WH3557> And there will I nourish אֹֽתְךָ֙ <WH853> שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> There כִּי־ <WH3588> there ע֛וֹד <WH5750> are still חָמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> thee for yet [there are] five שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> years רָעָ֑ב <WH7458> of famine פֶּן־ <WH6435> come תִּוָּרֵ֛שׁ <WH3423> and all that thou hast come to poverty אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you וּבֵֽיתְךָ֖ <WH1004> lest thou and thy household וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לָֽךְ׃

וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold עֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <WH5869> And behold your eyes רֹא֔וֹת <WH7200> see וְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> and the eyes אָחִ֣י <WH251> of my brother בִנְיָמִ֑ין <WH1144> Benjamin כִּי־ <WH3588> that it פִ֖י <WH6310> that [it is] my mouth הַֽמְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> that speaketh אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

וְהִגַּדְתֶּ֣ם <WH5046> And ye shall tell לְאָבִ֗י <WH1> my father אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> of all כְּבוֹדִי֙ <WH3519> of all my glory בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> in Egypt וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> you רְאִיתֶ֑ם <WH7200> and of all that ye have seen וּמִֽהַרְתֶּ֛ם <WH4116> and ye shall haste וְהוֹרַדְתֶּ֥ם <WH3381> and bring down אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֖י <WH1> my father הֵֽנָּה׃ <WH2008> here

וַיִּפֹּ֛ל <WH5307> And he fell עַל־ <WH5921> and צַוְּארֵ֥י <WH6677> neck בִנְיָמִֽן־ <WH1144> Benjamin's אָחִ֖יו <WH251> upon his brother וַיֵּ֑בְךְּ <WH1058> and wept וּבִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> and Benjamin בָּכָ֖ה <WH1058> wept עַל־ <WH5921> on צַוָּארָֽיו׃ <WH6677> upon his neck

וַיְנַשֵּׁ֥ק <WH5401> Moreover he kissed לְכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> all his brethren וַיֵּ֣בְךְּ <WH1058> and wept עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> upon וְאַ֣חֲרֵי <WH310> upon them and after כֵ֔ן <WH3651> after that דִּבְּר֥וּ <WH1696> talked אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> that his brethren אִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH854> now when

וְהַקֹּ֣ל <WH6963> And the fame נִשְׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> thereof was heard בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> house פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> in Pharaoh's לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying בָּ֖אוּ <WH935> are come אֲחֵ֣י <WH251> brethren יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> Joseph's וַיִּיטַב֙ <WH3190> be accepted בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> and פַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> Pharaoh וּבְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> affliction עֲבָדָֽיו׃ <WH5650> his servants

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> And Pharaoh אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> unto Joseph אֱמֹ֥ר <WH559> Say אֶל־ <WH413> to אַחֶ֖יךָ <WH251> unto thy brethren זֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise עֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> This do טַֽעֲנוּ֙ <WH2943> ye lade אֶת־ <WH853> בְּעִ֣ירְכֶ֔ם <WH1165> your beasts וּלְכוּ־ <WH1980> along בֹ֖אוּ <WH935> get אַ֥רְצָה <WH776> you unto the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan

וּקְח֧וּ <WH3947> And take אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִיכֶ֛ם <WH1> your father וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּתֵּיכֶ֖ם <WH1004> and your households וּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> and come אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me וְאֶתְּנָ֣ה <WH5414> unto me and I will give לָכֶ֗ם אֶת־ <WH853> טוּב֙ <WH2898> you the good אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְאִכְל֖וּ <WH398> and ye shall eat אֶת־ <WH853> חֵ֥לֶב <WH2459> the fat הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

וְאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> now you צֻוֵּ֖יתָה <WH6680> Now thou art commanded זֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise עֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> this do קְחוּ־ <WH3947> ye take לָכֶם֩ מֵאֶ֨רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַ֜יִם <WH4714> of Egypt עֲגָל֗וֹת <WH5699> you wagons לְטַפְּכֶם֙ <WH2945> for your little ones וְלִנְשֵׁיכֶ֔ם <WH802> and for your wives וּנְשָׂאתֶ֥ם <WH5375> and bring אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִיכֶ֖ם <WH1> your father וּבָאתֶֽם׃ <WH935> and come

וְעֵ֣ינְכֶ֔ם <WH5869> Also אַל־ <WH408> nay תָּחֹ֖ס <WH2347> regard עַל־ <WH5921> with כְּלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH3627> not your stuff כִּי־ <WH3588> for ט֛וּב <WH2898> for the good כָּל־ <WH3605> of all אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> of all the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לָכֶ֥ם הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <WH6213> did כֵן֙ <WH3651> so בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> gave לָהֶ֥ם יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> so and Joseph עֲגָל֖וֹת <WH5699> them wagons עַל־ <WH5921> according פִּ֣י <WH6310> according to the commandment פַרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and gave לָהֶ֛ם צֵדָ֖ה <WH6720> them provision לַדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> for the way

לְכֻלָּ֥ם <WH3605> he נָתַ֛ן <WH5414> To all of them he gave לָאִ֖ישׁ <WH582> another חֲלִפ֣וֹת <WH2487> changes שְׂמָלֹ֑ת <WH8071> of raiment וּלְבִנְיָמִ֤ן <WH1144> but to Benjamin נָתַן֙ <WH5414> he gave שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> three מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> hundred כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> [pieces] of silver וְחָמֵ֖שׁ <WH2568> and five חֲלִפֹ֥ת <WH2487> changes שְׂמָלֹֽת׃ <WH8071> of raiment

וּלְאָבִ֞יו <WH1> And to his father שָׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> he sent כְּזֹאת֙ <WH2063> after this עֲשָׂרָ֣ה <WH6235> [manner] ten חֲמֹרִ֔ים <WH2543> she asses נֹשְׂאִ֖ים <WH5375> laden מִטּ֣וּב <WH2898> with the good things מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְעֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> and ten אֲתֹנֹ֡ת <WH860> asses נֹֽ֠שְׂאֹת <WH5375> laden בָּ֣ר <WH1250> with corn וָלֶ֧חֶם <WH3899> and bread וּמָז֛וֹן <WH4202> and meat לְאָבִ֖יו <WH1> for his father לַדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> by the way

וַיְשַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> away אֶת־ <WH853> אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> his brethren וַיֵּלֵ֑כוּ <WH1980> departed וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and he said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> about אַֽל־ <WH408> not תִּרְגְּז֖וּ <WH7264> unto them See that ye fall not out בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> by the way

וַֽיַּעֲל֖וּ <WH5927> And they went up מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> and came אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> into the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> of Canaan אֶֽל־ <WH413> about יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> unto Jacob אֲבִיהֶֽם׃ <WH1> their father

וַיַּגִּ֨דוּ <WH5046> And told ל֜וֹ לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> him saying ע֚וֹד <WH5750> is still יוֹסֵ֣ף <WH3130> Joseph חַ֔י <WH2416> [is] yet alive וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> and indeed ה֥וּא <WH1931> he מֹשֵׁ֖ל <WH4910> and he [is] governor בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> over all the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וַיָּ֣פָג <WH6313> fainted לִבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> And Jacob's heart כִּ֥י <WH3588> and indeed לֹא־ <WH3808> did not הֶאֱמִ֖ין <WH539> for he believed לָהֶֽם׃

וַיְדַבְּר֣וּ <WH1696> And they told אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> about אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵ֤י <WH1697> him all the words יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> of Joseph אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> which he had said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> to וַיַּרְא֙ <WH7200> unto them and when he saw אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣עֲגָל֔וֹת <WH5699> the wagons אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after שָׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> had sent יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> which Joseph לָשֵׂ֣את <WH5375> to carry אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> וַתְּחִ֕י <WH2421> revived ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> him the spirit יַעֲקֹ֥ב <WH3290> of Jacob אֲבִיהֶֽם׃ <WH1> their father

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> And Israel רַ֛ב <WH7227> [It is] enough עוֹד־ <WH5750> is still יוֹסֵ֥ף <WH3130> Joseph בְּנִ֖י <WH1121> my son חָ֑י <WH2416> [is] yet alive אֵֽלְכָ֥ה <WH1980> will go וְאֶרְאֶ֖נּוּ <WH7200> and see him בְּטֶ֥רֶם <WH2962> before אָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> before I die
